home.title: Cancer Type Prediction Tool
home.subtitle: Advanced machine learning for accurate cancer type classification using patient data

mlModel.title: Advanced ML Model
mlModel.description: Our model has been trained on extensive medical datasets to accurately classify nine different types of cancer, including breast, colorectal, and lung cancer.

flexibleInput.title: Flexible Input
flexibleInput.description: Upload your data in various formats including CSV, XLSX, or JSON. Our system processes the data and provides instant predictions.

batchProcessing.title: Batch Processing
batchProcessing.description: Process multiple samples simultaneously with our efficient batch prediction system. Get results for hundreds of samples in seconds.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: Your data security is our priority. All uploads are processed securely and no patient data is stored after analysis.

tutorial.title: How to Use This Website
tutorial.subtitle: A comprehensive guide to help you navigate and utilize our prediction platform effectively

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.welcome: Welcome to our prediction platform! This tutorial will guide you through the process of using our website to make predictions and analyze results.
gettingStarted.begin: To begin, you'll need to prepare your data in the correct format. We provide a template file that you can download and use as a reference.

dataPreparation.title: Data Preparation
dataPreparation.downloadTemplate: Download our template file from the Dashboard page
dataPreparation.fillData: Fill in your data following the format shown in the template
dataPreparation.requiredFields: Ensure all required fields are filled out correctly

uploadProcess.title: Uploading Your Data
uploadProcess.waitProcess: Wait for the file to be processed

resultsInterpretation.title: Understanding Results
resultsInterpretation.afterUpload: After uploading your file, you'll see:
resultsInterpretation.detailedResults: Detailed results in a table format

tips.title: Tips and Best Practices
tips.checkData: Always double-check your input data for accuracy
tips.followTemplate: Make sure your file follows the template format exactly
tips.saveResults: Save your results for future reference
tips.useFeedback: Use the feedback form to report any issues or suggestions

support.title: Support
support.ifIssues: If you encounter any issues or have questions:
support.useFeedback: Use the feedback form to report issues
support.referAbout: Refer to the Our Team page for more information about us

dashboard.title: Cancer Type Prediction
dashboard.description: Upload a CSV, XLSX, or JSON file containing patient data to predict cancer types. The model will analyze each row and classify it into one of nine categories.

template.title: Need a template?
template.description: Download our template file to ensure your data is formatted correctly. Fill in your gene expression values and upload it back for prediction.
template.downloadError: Failed to download template. Please try again.

fileUpload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here, or
fileUpload.supportedTypes: Supported file types: CSV, XLSX, JSON

feedback.title: Doctor's Feedback
feedback.description: We value your professional opinion. Please share your experience with our prediction tool.

form.name: Full Name
form.error: Error submitting feedback. Please try again.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.university: Faculty of Artificial Intelligence at Delta University for Science and Technology
team.projectTitle: AI-Powered Liquid Biopsy for Precision Cancer Classification
team.projectDescription: This cancer prediction tool was developed as part of our 6th semester project. It combines artificial intelligence with liquid biopsy data to support more accurate cancer classification and diagnosis.
team.supervisorRole:
Head of the Bioinformatics Department
Delta University for Science and Technology

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.message: This tool is for educational purposes only. We are not responsible for any misuse of this tool. The predictions and information provided should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
